{{Description|The word from the merchant trail is that a certain "[[Unusual Hilichurl]]" has been gathering its fellow 'churls out in the wild recently...<br>If you want to catch this most mysterious creature, you may find that the best strategy is to ingratiate yourself with some [[hilichurls]] and enlist their help...}}
'''Mimi Tomo''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 1.5]].

During this event, players will have to track down an [[Unusual Hilichurl]]. The players will get some help from [[Hilichurlian]] expert [[Ella Musk]] and her [[Handy Handbook of Hilichurlian]] to communicate with other hilichurls to find whereabouts on the Unusual Hilichurl. Complete the investigation of the "Unusual Hilichurl" to obtain rewards such as Liyue-style [[Furnishing Blueprints]], [[Primogems]], [[Hero's Wit]], and [[Mora]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
*Event Gameplay Period: 2021-05-27 10:00:00 - 2021-06-06 03:59:59
*"The Lost Hilichurl" Quest: 2021-06-06 04:00:00 - 2021-06-08 03:59:59

===Requirements===
[[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above

===Summary===
*During the event, there are seven Sighting Locations to investigate. Once the event begins, one investigation location will be unlocked each day.
*With assistance from Hilichurlian expert [[Ella Musk]], the Traveler is tasked with finding hilichurls that are open to communication and asking them for more information on the whereabouts of the Unusual Hilichurl.
*The commissions can be either giving an item, or killing enemies.
*After completing requests for hilichurls, they will inform you of the time period during which the Unusual Hilichurl will be active, and also indicate the approximate location. Track down and defeat the Unusual Hilichurl [[File:Icon Mimi Tomo.svg|20x20px]] at these times to obtain rewards.
*During the event, after a Traveler accepts the investigation quest in [[Co-Op Mode]], only the host can carry out the quest and receive quest-related rewards, including the [[Adventure EXP]] from the Unusual Hilichurl.
*After the event gameplay period ends, Travelers who have completed the "[[Mimi Tomo (Quest)|Mimi Tomo]]" quest can accept "[[The Lost Hilichurl]]" quest at [[Katheryne]]'s location in [[Mondstadt]]. Complete the quest to claim the corresponding rewards.
*Defeating the Unusual Hilichurl during the event does count towards the "...Well, That Was Strange" [[Achievement: Challenger II|Achievement]].

==Handy Handbook of Hilichurlian==
{{Main|Handy Handbook of Hilichurlian}}
{{Card|Handy Handbook of Hilichurlian|1}}
If you don't understand any phrases or sentences while communicating with the hilichurls, simply check the [[Handy Handbook of Hilichurlian]] kindly provided by Ella Musk (you can check the handbook in [[Inventory]] > Quest or on the event page).

==Sighting Locations==
There are seven Sighting Locations in this event, and only after completing the investigation for the previous Sighting Location can you unlock the quest at the next location.
* While doing the [[Mutual Exchange]] and [[Hilichurl Justice]] quests, you may find other hilichurls laying around that may try to attack upon approach.
* While fighting the Unusual Hilichurl, it will spawn waves of reinforcements when its health drops under 90% and 50%. The second wave of reinforcements will spawn even if the first wave has not been defeated yet. Reinforcements do not drop items, Mora, or experience. Defeating the Unusual Hilichurl will immediately despawn all reinforcements.
** De-aggroing the Unusual Hilichurl will cause it to reset to full health and allow it to spawn reinforcements again.
